Reviews.Title: READ THIS before making a buying decision
Reviews.Author: AEinstein
Reviews.Content: I almost did not purchase this camera because of some negative reviews.  However, I have and I'd like to address the negative comments.BLURRY PICTURES - when taken in low light conditions:YES - this does occur.  It did when I used the camera for the first time.REASON - the user may not see the funky 'hand' that is displayed which indicates a questionable photo.The simple solution is to set the MODE to 'SMART AUTO' !  THIS SHOULD BE THE DEFAULT MODE for the camera.The first photos I took in low light were blurry.  I thought the camera was defective.  After I went into the user manual (which was NOT a hard copy  but a disk) I figured out what was going on.  Samsung should put in instructions on how to use the 'common' functions of a camera.DIFFICULT TO USE:MAYBE YES - For the 'average user' who has little experience in photography.  But only -IF- they do not set the camera in 'SMART AUTO', or try and figure out what all the MENU items are.If you just want to POINT AND SHOOT set the MODE to SMART AUTO.For the EXPERIENCED user this camera allows you to create photos any way you want.  It's quite amazing how many settings you can manipulate.SLOW RESPONSE between shots:PERHAPS - This has a -slower- response than some of my other cameras.  But this also depends on the lighting and resolution settings.  However, I bought this for carry around, not rapid picture taking.BATTERY not standard:NO it is not - Problem is, if you want a -very small- camera you must have a -very small- battery.  Resulting in an no standard (AA or AAA) battery.  Get a larger camera if you want such a battery.

Reviews.Title: Well done sir..
Reviews.Author: Alex R. "acutus"
Reviews.Content: Apparently I went to MIT to study rocket science since I found this camera to be perfectly user friendly and straightforward.  Quick, quiet, fun, "cute" even, this thing is a real joy to own thus far.  At the price I paid (~$120 for camera and 8gb sdhc card and reader, bag, cleaning kit, tripod, and sweet cardboard box my cats love) this camera can't be beat for similar items elsewhere.  The front facing lcd I didn't think much of at first has been rather useful taking (accurate) self pics and not merely the gimmick I thought it was going to be.  Highly recommended...

Reviews.Title: Watch out
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera, the only thing to watch out for is that it does not use an SD card like it implies. It actually uses a MicroSD wich is not so bad but was not prepared for it.

Reviews.Title: Lots of Features for the Price
Reviews.Author: Jerry Simpson
Reviews.Content: Just recently purchased this camera for the wife.  All the time while on vacation trips, while I am trying to capture a shot on my camera, I would get this little tug on the shirt sleeve from the wife pointing out something that would make a great picture, which of course then I would miss the shot I was about to take. The solution, get the wife a camera that she would enjoy using, easy to quickly just point and shoot along with capturing some great pictures.  At first she wasn't sure about having a camera as she would just have me take the photo.  Now that she has used the camera for a short peroid of time, I most likely would loose an arm, a leg or both if I tried to take it away from her.  She very much enjoy using the camera, which by the way does take great pictures along with videos.  Its very small, which makes it easy to put into your shirt pocket or paint pocket, but not too small that would make it hard to hold.  I myself even found, after playing with the camera for a few minutes, thinking about going back and getting one for myself to use just as a carry around camera to keep in the car all the time.  I was amaze with all the features it has for the price, such as even program mode for the more pro camera buffs.  Even in low light, the auto smart setting did a very nice job of capturing a photo my wife made outside at night of our kids standing out in a parking lot of a resturant to where it even very clearly show the lights and signs in the background along with the subjets being photograph.  Something that normally would have caused an issue with the lighting. Accidently the wife even found out that the smile feature really works, while checking the camera out, it took her photo when she smilled while looking the at the front of the camera.  The display on the front is also a nice feature to have that you wouldn't expect to find in this price range.  An issue that may be a con to some is that the camera only uses microSD memory stick instead of the standard sizde SD.  To me, that wasn't an issue as most of the cell phones/camera combinations are now using the microSD and the prices have come down for the memory sticks.  I guess this was due the fact that the camera is much smaller than some so they had to make room some how.  We haven't done any fancy test shots to see how it compares to other cameras, but after using it, don't really see any reason to.  Its a fun little camera to have on trips or even around the home.  Its has too many features to list them all here as one can check out the specs or google the camera to find more about it.  The camera can capture at lower resolutions, if one need to save space on the memory stick. Also as you zoom the camera it will show you if its shooting at 14.2 or lower resolution to compesate for the digital zoom.  It comes with an AC USB adapter that charges the battery while in the camera. Yep, it uses rechargable battery instead of AA or AAA.  The same USB cord is also used to connect the camera to the computer for uploading photos or for downloading firmware and for special graphics for the children feature on the camera.  The CD that comes with the camera is only for the manual, a pdf file in many languages.  The software is stored in the camera, so once it is connected to the computer, it will ask you if its ok to install the software to transfer pictures.  The camera is also seen as a hard drive, so if you don't want to use their software, which seems fairly nice, one can just copy and paste the photos. I am running a desktop computer that uses windows 7 and didn't have any issues with getting the camera to be seen by the computer.  I also connected the camera to my netbook which has windows xp and also no issues there.  Not sure what happen with the other person that review the camera other than he may have gotten one that was bad from stock.  The camera does comes in several colors, but only have found the black one avail at the local stores.  With the 8gb microSD memory stick, it showed that around 1800 and something pictures could be taken in the highest quality mode.  There are now so many point and shoot cameras on the market and they all seem to do about the same in the quality of the pictures they take, that the only way to find the one you really like it too look at the features the camera has, what you are wanting to use the camera for, and how does it feel when holding the camera.  Most people now use the point and shoot cameras to send the photos via email or upload on the computer to look at more so than printing out the photos, which mean that all the megapixles in the world is not going to make the photo look any better if you are only saving the photo on the computer or uploading to facebook.  Even this 14.2 is an overkill for that, but if you are going to print out some photos from time to time, then the extra megapixles can help when doing very large photographs.  Just as and FYI, the cameras I use most of the time varies on what I am shooting.  I sometime shoot with a Sony DSLR, a Nikon DSLR and other times I use a Lumix DSLR, which I am finding to like more and more each time I use it. It nice to be able to switch between stills and videos using the same camera. As mention earlier, I purchased this camera as a gift for the wife and from what I can tell, it was a good choice.  It didn't resolve the issue about having the shirt sleeve being pulled while I am trying to make a picture, as now instead of her asking me to look over there at something I could make a picture of, its her saying....hey look at the great picture I just took, that you missed.  That's ok, as now there are two of us making photos when on our trips, so the action is never missed, I guess.

Reviews.Title: WORKS fine, Has little annoyances as with all LOWER end cameras
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: After reading the few reviews that was posted here I was really confused with what others are experiencing. I know I'm a pretty good photographer but my above average knowledge of cameras should not be why I have not had any problems thus far.I primarily shoot with a dSLR set up with weights anywhere from 4 lbs to 7 lbs depending on the setup, taking "self portraits" is next to impossible as a I'm a weakling of a man. I've been looking for a decent point and shoot camera for this purpose for a while. Although I have found a few okay ones in the past few years, Samsung 2nd screen is definite a great feature. When I saw that they put this feature in a $100 range camera I bought it.If you have never shot with a dSLR before and are one of those people who make fun of people carrying one. You need to try one out and take a look at the result. This camera is 14MP but the image is still not the best. Remember, it's the lense and the sensor size that produce a good quality photo, DON'T tell a person shooting with a 10MP dSLR that your camera is better because it shoots 14MP. Because I'm so used to dSLR quality, I hate P&S;, if they weren't so dang portable I would never own one! The photos produced by this Samsung is on the soft side and low light is noisy. But in bright sunlight, most people will find it sufficient.I plugged it via USB on a MAC, Win XP and Win7. they all read, so I have no idea what other people are doing. The most annoying thing is that the shutter button has very little tactile feel to it. As you may know, you need to push the shutter half way to focus, then you push it all the way down to take a picture. This is too sensitive on this camera. I often push it all the way without noticing.Second annoyance is the shutter LAG in low light conditions. The LCD would go blank for a bit before taking a picture.Last annoyance (that I've really notice thus far) shot to shot recycle time. If light is good, it takes about 2 seconds, but in lower light it takes 3-4 seconds before you are able to take another picture. If you are using flash, be prepare to wait a bit longer...and I'm using a 4GB class 6 Micro SDHC (transflash) card if you needed to know.Sorry for any typos.

Reviews.Title: Great Service!
Reviews.Author: Anderson
Reviews.Content: This Camera is great. Perfect Point and Shoot. I am in the military and having a small, compact camera is essential while visiting other countries is a must. This fits the bill perfectly. The Camera arrived earlier than expected and had everything that was promised by the seller. Thanks! I will buy again!

Reviews.Title: easy to use camera, love that it only has one cord!
Reviews.Author: sfras
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera i have used i can plug it in to charge and use the same card to upload my pics or just pull out the sd card and put it on my computer have no problems with win7 at all and find it very user friendly i havent been confused by anything on it I returned a kodak to get this one and i am very happy i did

Reviews.Title: SLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOW
Reviews.Author: Justin Ratcliff "egovirus"
Reviews.Content: Avoid this slow bloated pixel camera. Having read the positive reviews one has to wonder if there isn't some astroturfing going on around here.I am an experienced photographer using digital and film SLR's and occasionally medium format film as well, when I can afford it, for almost 20 years now. I know how to use a camera, and I know the camera doesn't make the shot, the shooter does, blah blah blah.This is a slow camera. You push the shutter release, and you wait, and you wait, and you wait, and then the camera fires, and then guess what? You wait a little longer, this time for it to process the photo you've just made.There's a reason why this camera is cheap. It's got some great features. None of those features make up for the fact that this camera makes garbage photos. You can fiddle with the settings all you want. Jack up the ISO for low light, dump the outrageous marketing gimmick 14MP resolution (which is utterly pointless when the image sensor is literally the size of a pinky nail!), use fill flash, anti-shake feature, you still end up with dodgy pix. Sorry, but it's a fact. Look elsewhere, or be prepared to write an authentic lukewarm review.

Reviews.Title: Incredible little camera!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer "Jennifer"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this wonderful little Samsung Digital Camera for my daughter who is heading out this week to study in Germany.  She has an Iphone that she used to take pictures on her last trip to Budapest, but her pictures just weren't that great.  She loved the convenience of her phone camera for its size, but again was disappointed in the pictures themselves.  Luckily, we came across this camera before she left. It is super small and easily fits into your pants pocket or small purse.  It has a cute little zoom lens that pops out while picture taking and with 14.2 MP it takes amazingly clear photos.  Also, the greatest thing about this camera is it is 2 sided.  Meaning you can point it directly at yourself and see the picture you are taking of yourself!  Really fun for the Facebook/Social media generation.  It is rechargeable..a must for anyone traveling abroad... and uses a micro SD card.  Just the most perfect camera.  I am purchasing one for myself today!

Reviews.Title: daughter's camera
Reviews.Author: GymMom2CAG
Reviews.Content: Great camera for a teenager - they love taking pics of themselves.  You will need to purchase an extra memory card though, because the built-in memory is not that large.

Reviews.Title: Decent smart camera
Reviews.Author: Kurt C
Reviews.Content: I had this camera for roughly a week now and must say it's work very well. I like the  features such as the smile & quint detection. Apparently for the smile detection you have to enable the front LCD display & then show your 32 teeth or a "big" smile *L* & it automatically takes ur pic. Cool feature.The only fault(so far) I have is with the back LCD. I smudges easily, i.e. fingerprints are retained even after wiping with a soft cloth. I guess one would have to also get screen protector to prevent the smudges.

Reviews.Title: Samsung's 14mpx + double viewer for $66 from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Franklin "Portu"
Reviews.Content: Nice & easy small camera, it's all I was looking for to take my own selfpics, well centered & w/ backgrounds!Very good deal, it was listed as "used" , and resulted a brand new in box with all accessories included .Was a pleasent surprise , for $66 (s/h included)! And,beter yet,w/ a check list w/ everything tested OK .Thanksfrank

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: CINTHIA PATR ANTONIO
Reviews.Content: Great service. Product as I expected. I bought it for my 11 year old.She's so happy wth it. I will recomend this product.

Reviews.Title: cool features, but blurry pics
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was really excited to play with this camera, it has some fun features. Unfortunately I am returning it because it takes a ridiculous amount of blurry photos if not bright daylight.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Santiago
Reviews.Content: All was excelent. 100% recommended. Shipping, handling and attention was great. I'm not in USA but i'm wordless, i just wanna say it was a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: qwiknic104
Reviews.Content: the camera is a great camera, arrived fast and the best part is when your doing the self portrait by looking at the front screen, all you have to do is smile and it will recognize that your smiling and take the picture by itself! no need to push the button. its great!

Reviews.Title: breeze
Reviews.Author: William C. Boyko "Husband"
Reviews.Content: Nice size. Great for self photos. Lots of features, although not all are intuitive. I continue to have problems with some features.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Shaniqua
Reviews.Content: Its the best camera to date that I have! It works superb for on the go shots when I am just out having a good time with family and friends! I love it!

Reviews.Title: Works wonderfully years later!
Reviews.Author: tinyvietgirl
Reviews.Content: I bought this my first year of college back in 2011 and I've had it ever since! It has gone through several uses and travel bags and still works like a charm! Battery life is still amazing too! DEFINITELY worth it.

Reviews.Title: 1 year of use
Reviews.Author: Tanisha Alexander
Reviews.Content: I love my Camera! I got it for $120 last year at Walmart. I make youtube videos and I use this camera for it.Lets go over some of the pros and cons!PRO - I love the front facing screen. I love the timer and I love being able to take my own pictures and see my poses before the camera takes the pictures. I love how it captures my pictures, I love the flash.Cons- It is slow between pictures. You cannot snap a picture and turn right around and snap another because it says processing for about 5-10 seconds. With a 8 gb sd card you can only record up to 25 minutes which is annoying if you make videos. When using the front facing screen while recording videos the quality is lower.Overall I love this camera but I am searching for another camera that is dedicated to video.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Christmas gift under $100
Reviews.Author: J. Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: At the time of my purchase, this item was going for less than $100. Amazing Christmas gift. Bought it for my sister and she loved it. It has facial recognition, as well as the "smile" function that many cameras nowadays have. (you smile and it snaps a pic once it has detected a the "gesture"). It's not heavy and it's pocket size. It does, however, feel a bit fragile, but it actually isn't!! Lol... I know that may be hard to comprehend, but if you buy it, you'll know what I mean...

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: rocy1990
Reviews.Content: this camera is awesome i didn't buy it from amazon i brought it from bestbuy. this camera takes wonderful pictures. one day we were taking picture and i turned around i heard i missed up the picture but when i looked at it, it look like a still picture and it didn't even look like i moved. this camera is worth the price even though i got mine on sale i love it and i would recommend this to anyone. you will not regret buying this camera.

Reviews.Title: So Great!!!
Reviews.Author: mimi328
Reviews.Content: This camera is so convenient! It has so many features that you wouldn't expect and the front screen is such a great idea :) plus you  really can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Great bargain
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Andres Varela
Reviews.Content: It's a great bargain, it came in the desired amount of time, although i would go for the full package (memory, tote bag, tripod), it's worth it, the camera by itself it seems a little incomplete and you would end up buying these extras for more money.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the Price !!!
Reviews.Author: **** be fair ****
Reviews.Content: Nice front LCD which I initially though they sent me the wrong item as you almost cannot see the LCD when the camera is off.It blends so nicely with black body.Picture quality leaves a lot to desire but for the price, no complaint.Thank you SAMSUNG

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Cheeze
Reviews.Content: Got it is a V-Day gift for girlfriend she loves it. she is all about the front lcd screen. pics are crisp with the 14.2 mp, the zoom is not all that though

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: jpartyof5
Reviews.Content: My husband purchased this camera for me as a gift. I like to take photos of the 2 of us together, so when he saw the double screen, he thought of me :). I really like that you can remove red eye right on the camera. I so far love everything about it, except the zoom button. It is very hard to push. Makes it difficult to zoom in while taking a photo, especially if you are trying to capture it quickly (kids for example). I do like the slim design, much better than my last cannon camera, however, I do miss being able to use AA batteries.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: DR
Reviews.Content: I have a canon sx130 but got tired of carrying around a camera case. I bought this to throw in my pocket and be able to take pictures with my friends. Now all the guess work is taken out of self portraits!

Reviews.Title: perfect for just us 2
Reviews.Author: KtB "Clock Lady"
Reviews.Content: my hubby and i travel a lot...just us 2, so its hard to get pictures of us together with a great background but the second screen works perfect!!! sometimes pictures get blurry which is sad because the camera features says its blurry free but anyhoo this camera is awesome! you will need to get a memory card because the camera alone only holds 5 pictures! it charges fast and was easy to hook up to the computer! we are still finding new things on this camera...WE LOVE IT!!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Maria Salud
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for years and it works the same as when I bought it. I've traveled out of country with it, take it with me to the pool, it's survived through all. I love it.

Reviews.Title: GREAT little camera!
Reviews.Author: Lisa in CT
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT little camera! I bought it used and it has performed wonderfully everyday since! It's very easy to use. I use it mainly for shots & closeups of items for ebay & Etsy. As long as you have some nice natural lighting, your pictures will come out great. The flash works well too, but for my purposes, I don't like a flash reflection in the subject. I highly recommend this little gem!

Reviews.Title: Correction rate
Reviews.Author: Martin Reyes
Reviews.Content: Hago constar que esta compañia es leal a sus clientes, con muy buenas atenciones y brindan un excelente servicio. Estoy complacido con el servicio. Recomiendo a todo público a comprar a traves de ellos. Martin Reyes.I certify that this company is loyal to its customers, with very good care and provide excellent service. I am pleased with the service. I encourage all people to buy through them. Martin Reyes.

Reviews.Title: satisfied !!
Reviews.Author: Aundrianna Carter
Reviews.Content: This camera is the was fairly cheap and works like a pro, I think I may have purchased it in late 2011 or early 2012 and I am still using it in 2014 and it's working like a charm.

Reviews.Title: good but
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Valverde
Reviews.Content: Think is a perfect cam and have tons of features for the price but at the same time it can be a problem for an "average user", I mean is not so hard to use it but if you need a good pic fast in a specific condition can be a trouble to find what are you looking for...

Reviews.Title: Good Entry Level but...
Reviews.Author: Scott Everngam
Reviews.Content: Good entry level camera and comes with the novelty of the forward facing screen, but that's about it. Nothing spectacular. Good for the price point.

Reviews.Title: Replacement Rating based on Amazing Customer Service from this company!!!
Reviews.Author: Terri L McFarland
Reviews.Content: I rated this item the other day saying that I was happy with the camera, but I was disappointed because the packaging looked like tape had ripped off portions of the picture on the outer box.  Not really a big deal, but since it was a gift so I was disappointed...HOWEVER, I was so pleasantly surprised, that the company actually called me and offered to send a replacement box!  They gave me the best customer service I've had in a long time!  I can't say enough about how great they were to me.  I would definitely make many purchases from this company.  Amazing!

Reviews.Title: sucks
Reviews.Author: Maria C
Reviews.Content: worse camera i ever had, it takes forever between shots, after having it for some time it makes blurry pictures. bottom line, do not buy this item

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Pau  Armella R
Reviews.Content: Great camera, take hd formar photo AnD i like it so much. Im my photo lover And this is my new tool

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Danni
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera! It takes clear and vivid pictures! The front facing LCD is perfect for taking selfies and getting small children to look at the camera.  I took this to Mexico with me and my friends were jealous because this camera took the pretties pictures (aside from those with professional cameras). The only thing I do not like is that battery. It died fairly quickly in comparison to my friends' cameras.

Reviews.Title: Sloo-o-ow and poor colors
Reviews.Author: Tanara
Reviews.Content: If you don't pre focus the scene, the shutter speed are extreeeeemely slow.And the color are worse then a same priced Sony.I have to agree that the front sreen helps a lot, but you have always to turn on the flash if you want flash (because the camera automatically turns it off when you turn on the front screen).Other good think is the SCENE MODE. It allows you to make good pictures but in LOW QUALITY (1mb for example in Scene: "Objects Highlight").I would suggest you to buy an Sony or Canon istead. They are SO MUCH BETTER!

Reviews.Title: I loved this camera the first time I bought it but the second not so much.
Reviews.Author: chelsea griffin
Reviews.Content: I loved this product when I first got it for prom. All of the pictures come out beautifully and the front view helped but I had to buy again because it was stolen. The second time around the camera stopped working out of nowhere the screen just went white. I know I didn't drop it or get water in it because I am very careful about my electronics. Highly disappointing didn't even go through the trouble of getting a refund

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: L. Bogdan
Reviews.Content: This is worthlessCons:--the pictures are not much better than those taken by cellphone--the menu and the manual look antiquated as for Windows 98--I cannot connect through cord in Windows 7 or Windows XP and ...--the internal memory and the card are minuscule-I only can get very few photos on it--the seller (Blink) sent me to Canada via DHL even if it was specified regular mail.Pros:-it is light

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Bryon R. Czaja
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. We bought it for our anniversary vacation, so we could take shots of the two of us, and not have to worry about how they come out. It did the job! The pictures look great!I love the dual view! I love the smile detector!The magic frame feature is cool.I do wish it had more programmed scenes, but it's a really good camera either way.Buy it! It's definitely a great purchase.It does take a bit of time to process, but if you know to expect that, it isn't really a bummer.I do not like this camera for taking video, just a thought.  My other camera takes better video, so if you are looking for video, I don't recommend this one.  Again, I have another cam, so this one gets 5 stars. It more than meets our needs.

Reviews.Title: Slow, horrible photos unless it's perfectly sunny!
Reviews.Author: princesspea
Reviews.Content: We've had this thing since 2011. We bought it just before our vacation that year because our other camera stopped working and it seemed to be the best price for the best features, and we really loved the front facing lcd feature.Well..Issue 1:it takes what seems like 10-15 seconds between shots to load the screen/ability to take another photo. I haven't timed it out but it's a long time compared to the norm! Even people who were taking a photo or two for us made a face like "What the....", and then when the photo came onto the LCD and was blurry as heck it was "OMG..." (how embarrassing!)Issue 2: 70% of our photos were blurry from our recent 2013 vacation. I was able to get some photos to be a little less blurry than my husband, but still. Unless it was perfectly sunny and maybe if we used a tripod for every photo- it seemed impossible to get a clear shot.Issue 3: Low light photos........ FORGET IT. I know this is a tough issue with point and shoot cameras, but this one is insanely horrible if it's the least bit of dim conditions. Overcast day.... forget about taking any decent shots.After our recent vacation, I debated getting a DSLR. While one day I may want to, I know they are a bit bulky to carry around. So I am on the hunt for a much better point and shoot camera. Probably a Canon!

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Chelsea
Reviews.Content: I had the same camera and it broke on me so I bought another one. I love the fact that you can see your picture in the front when taking it.

Reviews.Title: Makes A Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Wayne L. Reid
Reviews.Content: Got this as a gift for a friend.The feedback has been totally positive.The ability to line up self pictures with other friends is very mush appreciated.

Reviews.Title: CHEAP AND GOOD FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: ha
Reviews.Content: THIS IS VERY CHEAP CAMERA COMPARE TO GETTING ONE AT BEST BUY OR OTHER ELECTRONIC STORE. THE CAMERA WORKS FINE...I BROUGHT FOR A FRIEND OF MINE AND I TRY IT AND IT SEEMS TO WORK WHEN I GOT. SO HOPEFULLY IT CONTINUES TO WORK

Reviews.Title: Pictures ok
Reviews.Author: Tennis Kanaka
Reviews.Content: I bought this for the 2nd screen but don't use it much.  Pictures turn out dark, I have to lighten them up in Picassa.

Reviews.Title: Did not meet expectation
Reviews.Author: justin
Reviews.Content: This one did not meet my expectation. Slow in motion & everything.Not satisfied unfortunately.Basic needed cable was not included either **;;

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality
Reviews.Author: Judi
Reviews.Content: The product meets all my expectations and my experience of this purchase is exceptional. It is easier and safer to choose my articles.

Reviews.Title: The best camera I have ever bought!
Reviews.Author: raysavestheday
Reviews.Content: This camera takes phenomenal pictures that blow me away every single time! The front screen that is offered is definitely the biggest selling point of this product but you have to be careful with it because I learned the hard way the outside screen is not invincible and ended up cracking it when it was dropped. I still use the product to this day even though the front LCD no longer works but that is something that was totally my fault and unrelated to the seller. I was stunned at the low price I got it for and another thing that makes this camera so amazing is how it uses MicroSD cards instead of the traditional SD card. I like that for the fact I can take the card out after taking pictures than plug it into my cellphone so I can upload the pictures instantly and put them on social networking sites and edit them using apps like Instagram. I've had the product for about a year and a half and it still works flawlessly! The battery life is also pretty great and can make it through any day full of picture taking! Thanks for giving me such a great product at an affordable price!

Reviews.Title: My Samsung is the Best
Reviews.Author: pinky
Reviews.Content: I am really satisfied with the Camera. It takes wonderful pictures and they are clear.I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a good, inexpensive camera

Reviews.Title: samsun ec-pl 120
Reviews.Author: stephenfsnyder
Reviews.Content: product recieved in good time, good price.  blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah blah

Reviews.Title: Incredible small, inexpensive camera.
Reviews.Author: David Irland
Reviews.Content: For the amount of money ($80, open box) this is an amazing thing. Picture quality is great, and it has enough functions for semi-serious photography. More than I will ever need. The front LCD is one of those things you get used to and wonder how you ever lived without it. In-camera rechargable battery life is excellent. Camera's tiny, but well made, and you don't notice it in a coat pocket. Great travel buddy. The micro-SD cards now are so cheap you can save hours of video for, what, $20?

Reviews.Title: Pic Perfect
Reviews.Author: Oscar Nunez Jr.
Reviews.Content: Just what I expected and the qualities are amazing, I would gladly recommend this camera to all friends and family! :)

Reviews.Title: SUPER slow SHUTTER. Blurry night pictures
Reviews.Author: E. Padron
Reviews.Content: Seller was good. Bought it as used, arrived looking new.  Camera? Lousy! Tinkered with the settings and still blurry pictures after dark.  Took it to a restaurant with friends, Mistake! Embarrassing! Lousy pictures. I dont recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Super Camera! VERY GOOD AND FUN!
Reviews.Author: Jesler G. Garcia Rojas "jesler"
Reviews.Content: Great camera for beginners and the Price it's pretty good... Good picture quality, good battery life, easy to use and it's nice to have a rechargeable battery built in instead of always changing batteries. and it has a screen on the front that let's you take perfect profile pictures.. I have 2 baby nieces and with the animation feature, you are able to have a little animation video on the front lcd to help draw attention from little kids to the camera. I would certainly recommend this to anyone who wants to buy a new camera. Believe me, you will not regret it.Pros:  Bright display, Inexpensive, Lightweight, Realistic color, dual view, multiple featuresno cons!

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS!!!
Reviews.Author: Laraine Thompson
Reviews.Content: I bought this a little over a year ago and I'm glad I did. The front screen is awesome and is easy to take self shots with. Takes great video and it's easy to use. Great investment!

Reviews.Title: amazon
Reviews.Author: gilberto sanchez
Reviews.Content: excellent image quality of the photographs is the zoom good shots lejo not lose sharpness lasting battery easy to use camera

Reviews.Title: bueno bueno
Reviews.Author: jean marcos guerra
Reviews.Content: bueno bueno gracias y que dios los bendigas y que sigan prestando un buen servicios para que sigan vendiendo gracias

Reviews.Title: serves the purpose
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: This camera is good.  It is simple, like I wanted.  The main reason I bought this camera is because it has a front facing screen.  It seems that most of my pictures were me with one other person with my arm stretched out taking the picture; so at least now I can make sure it is centered. As far as I know there is no other camera like it available from what I could find.  I think it is a great idea and more companies should follow suit.  All cell phones have front facing cameras now, why not regular cameras?

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Francisco Peinero
Reviews.Content: I recommend it 100% this Zoom G1N Guitar Multi Effects Pedal. The product is very good. Good buy, I'm from Venezuela

Reviews.Title: gracias
Reviews.Author: Eliezer
Reviews.Content: Todo muy gracias, el regalo de mis ahijados... esta perfecto para ellos y toda la familia.. .. . . . .

Reviews.Title: me encanta
Reviews.Author: gloribel tiberio
Reviews.Content: una cámara muy excelente, fácil de manejar las funciones son buenas todas las funciones y me encanta poder tomarme las fotos con la doble pantalla

Reviews.Title: g
Reviews.Author: Cesar E. Alegre
Reviews.Content: all was great, product worked as expected and required. Price was good, planning on refilling when run out of pro

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: John Jairo Balanta Quintero
Reviews.Content: It's a great product, im happy with it's good quality and excellent condition i recomended it good choicethanks a lot

Reviews.Title: felicidades
Reviews.Author: glery
Reviews.Content: hola la compra salio bien todo fue un exito espero que siempren sigan asi y muchas gracias por todo y felicidades y disculpe la demora por mi comentario

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: MsVicky
Reviews.Content: Amazing camera does wonders! VERY SENSITIVE, let my boyfriend borrow it and in two days, screen cracked, this was the replacement he bought me, I had to have it again!Buy  a case definitively and if you are a little rough like me BF he just bought the other version with internal zoom and a CASE!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Diana Lorena Delgado
Reviews.Content: Samsung EC-PL120 Digital Camera with 14.2 MP and 5x Optical Zoom... its really nice, easy to use, i love the double scream, good definitios. I recommend it. I had bought twice.

Reviews.Title: cool camera, but image stabilization does not function as well as you want to
Reviews.Author: farhan sadique
Reviews.Content: i like it but the front screen picture feature is not as cool without the proper image stabilization. so it became a bit frustrating to use it. you are far better off getting a smart phone with 8 megapixel camera with dual view because it will be a FAR better investment.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Sofia B
Reviews.Content: Thought it came with a regular HD Card which disappointed me that it didn't.  My daughter has had this camera before until it was sat on and broke. Takes decent photos.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: LNZ
Reviews.Content: Product came as described. Fast arrival! Great doing business with you! Will definitely do business with you again in the future.

Reviews.Title: Beth  self camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas Radley "TomR"
Reviews.Content: Gave this to my wife (I am a vanity facilitator) and she takes her picture everywhere and occasionally a picture of me or surroundings. But mostly of herself haha. The dual camera is invaluable. But now she has eyes on my Samsung tablet because it does the same thing only bigger! She would give it 5 stars and I would give it 3 only. It is too petite, and sometimes slow to respond because of the 14MB

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Rafael
Reviews.Content: The product is great, is workinf perfectly and I have no complains about it so far and I don't think that will be one ever. It is making my job so much easier.

Reviews.Title: Nice cam, it takes excelents pictures.. so easy to handle
Reviews.Author: lis
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, its so friendly to use, takes excelent pictures, great price- value relation; The frontal screams is so useful when you are taking the pictures with the timer

Reviews.Title: Dual screen camera.
Reviews.Author: marya
Reviews.Content: My daughter is having a ball with this camera. The dual screen has been very enticing to her. Now she can take as many of her personal pictures as she wants.

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: rebecca m williams
Reviews.Content: very nice, the extra viewer on front of camera is really cool!!I have  not used camera yet but I think front viewer will help for self portraits!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Anthony Salvaro
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the pricebut there are two things i would recommendif you are using this camera with a Desktopthen your going to need a longer USB cordthe one that comes with it is VERY shortand is made for people who will use this camerawith a laptopthis cord works perfect[...]Also you should pick up a micro SD card toothe memory thats built in the camera is pretty smalllike i said GREAT camera

Reviews.Title: Good value for features
Reviews.Author: Oxide
Reviews.Content: Good camera with neat features for self shots. Manual not user friendly but after a while camera can be figured out.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice camara. No problems with it at all. And it shipped fast and hassle free... Very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung EC-PL120 Digital Camera with 14.2 MP and 5x Optical Zoom (Black)
Reviews.Author: Trish
Reviews.Content: This just arrived, the delivery time was swift which I really appreciate that since it was projected to be here by Jan 4th 2012 and I need it for New Years' Eve - needless to say that in spite of the holiday, I got this item within four business days...hooray!!!I've been playing with it, checking the various scene modes and features since I am a former devout Sony customer and so far it's been impressive; I really like the front view screen and self-portrait mode - it's very unique.The size of the camera is manageable,it's not too small so as to get lost in my pocket or clutch which is a plus as well. I'm very pleased so far - I hope it stands-up to the rigors of partying on New Years' Eve and capturing terrific pictures in less than ideal lighting.

Reviews.Title: Good One
Reviews.Author: samsung camera
Reviews.Content: Nice and small Camera and does pretty good job. I got exactly what I paid for.It has many options to set front LCD. The most important thing is that it records a movie/video is amazingly in high quality.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: When I got the camera it was selling for $99. For that price im really happy. Its got a lot of nice picture features. Good clarity and zoom. The dual lcd's are nice to have. And I really like the control you get with this camera. From shutter rates to ISO control, filter choices and modes. Its menu is really easy to navigate. And its a very small and light camera. Definitely worth the 100 bucks

Reviews.Title: Great Gift Idea
Reviews.Author: Sybil
Reviews.Content: While I haven't used the camera,it was a gift for our granddaughter. She loves it and has been using it a lot.She says the pictures turn out really good. Also fits nicely in her back pack.What I noticed was that the camera was small enough to fit in any pocket, which I like.The price was good and delivery of camera was quick.

Reviews.Title: What a GREAT camera
Reviews.Author: T. Hiemenz "seabreeze14"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  I am not a professional photographer and lately all my 'prints' are in digital scrapbooks.  This camera is extremely easy to use and the LCD in the front is a terrific idea.  My wife and I often travel alone and I take pictures of us from an outstretched arm.  The front LCD makes it easy to frame the shot.  Movies look great on my 55" LCD TV. Another good feature is "smart auto"--no more messing with settings--the camera decides what is best and, so far, it has seldom been wrong.  Night shots take a fair amount of time to process but the pictures are wonderful.  At $99 this thing is a steal!

Reviews.Title: Muy buena càmara
Reviews.Author: Galo
Reviews.Content: Todo muy bien, la camara funciona correctamente, no hablo ingles, lo siento. No se que mas pones, soy relativamente nuevo en esto de comprar en internet

Reviews.Title: best camera I've ever owned!
Reviews.Author: heyimisabella
Reviews.Content: This camera is so amazing! I got it exactly one week ago and I am infatuated with this camera (weird? yes I know) I was scared that because it was inexpensive that it wouldn't work that well but this camera is just phenomenal. I've had about 6 little digital cameras before this one (I have bad luck with cameras and the whole "breaking them" situation so fingers crossed nothing happens to this one) and this one is by FAR my favorite. My only and I repeat ONLY problem with this camera is the zoom button is quite tough to work but not impossible. The front screen really helps if you want to take pictures with friends and family. The focus is very nice and the camera takes beautiful photos! I do wish the video setting was a little easier to access but never mind that. The camera is so good to just keep around in your pocket and you can take it anywhere really. I recommend this camera to anyone who is looking for a GREAT quality camera that isn't too expensive. It wasn't hard to set everything up and I just love it!

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: donellyrodas
Reviews.Content: the camera is in very good working condition, includes everything that the seller offered, the delivery time was good, the equipment condition are better than I expected, I would buy another item with this seller, thanks

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality Pics, so disappointed
Reviews.Author: Shop4Ever
Reviews.Content: I had a previous Samsung Dual LCD camera that I bought a couple of years ago and just loved it.  I lost it right before the holidays and was in a hurry to find another one.  I went back to find the camera was no longer available, but chose this one because of the similarities and it was the brand I had previously trusted.  To my dismay, I got the camera and it just took terrible pictures.  The features were similar and it was on AutoSmart, but the pics turned out blurry or had a weird color tone.  I've returned it.  I'm not sure that I'll go with Samsung again, all I know is I sure do miss my camera they made from two years ago :-(

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Juan M.
Reviews.Content: I found it an excellent article 100% functional and very satisfied, very good vendendeor, everything went as expected, thank you best regards from Venezuela.

Reviews.Title: camera fine, no cord, they forgot main part hello..
Reviews.Author: Mariah P
Reviews.Content: Camera fine..so far. But no cord to charge it so went and bought one. All other cords etc showed but not charge camera cord lol.

Reviews.Title: EQUIPO EN MUY BUEN ESTADO
Reviews.Author: maria nuñez
Reviews.Content: EXCELENTE. QUEDE SATISFECHA CON EL PRODUCTO.ME PARECE UN PRODUCTO DE BUENA CALIDAD Y MUY BUENA IMAGEN A MUY BUEN PRECIO

Reviews.Title: Great Little camera
Reviews.Author: Douglas N. Travis "An American Mini Mate"
Reviews.Content: Great size to carry with you at all time. Great features, and easy to use. It will be an important part of our travels.

Reviews.Title: Samsung dual view camera
Reviews.Author: P. Snyder
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a christmas gift for my 13 yr old daughter. I thought it would be a fun camera since the kids are into taking picts of themselves for FB, etc. As it turns out the shutter speed on this camera is waayy to slow and all of the pictures came out blurry, even when we changed the setting/etc. Also, when you hit the button on top to turn the front view on, the screen does not always come on or it takes a long time. This was a bummer... as I was quite disappointed since samsung usually puts out great products! (I wouldn't trade my TV in for the world) So I'm returning the camera for a refund and will look for another camera or may even just give in to the new IPhone since it does it all and takes great pictures ; (

Reviews.Title: Cute effects and tricks but the lens quality lacks.
Reviews.Author: Anne Elliott
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera to replace my TL225, I couldn't afford the same model at the time so I settled on this seemingly better camera. (Lots of neat effects, same front lcd display for impromptu photos with friends.) Upon receiving the camera I was less than thrilled. The camera was much lighter and seemed more fragile and the lens wasn't impressive at all. Every picture I took had a good amount of distortion, even for an economy digital camera. While the features are cool the distortion was a bit too much for me.I own a few higher end cameras so perhaps I'm just too picky. I returned mine the same day.The bottom line. If you're looking for a camera that takes flattering pictures. Keep searching or invest in something a little better.If you want something small and fun. Try it out. What's the worst that could happen?

Reviews.Title: I cancelled my order because a newer version was available at a cheaper price.
Reviews.Author: G. L. Niles
Reviews.Content: I was unaware when I ordered this that there was a new and improved version available at B&H; Camera at the same price, shipping costs to Hawaii included.  After several postponements by Amazon of the shipping date, I cancelled the order for this one, and luckily found the newer item.  The worst part about this was the inability to get this item shipped when promised.  The best part was that if it had been shipped, I would have unluckily received the older version.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it!
Reviews.Author: KikiStark
Reviews.Content: I was really excited to play with this camera, it has some cool features. Unfortunately I am returning it because this is a slow camera, the pictures are blurry, has no flash so pictures at nigh are horrible...I got it thinking on my races but it didn't make through the fist event, it just stopped working in the first hour or so, I was very disappointed.Before I bought the camera I read a lot of the reviews and I thought this would be a great camera for my races but at the end it wasn't and I end up buying something else...

Reviews.Title: too tiny -hard to hold, Preparatory battery & cable is a problem
Reviews.Author: Skip M "Skip"
Reviews.Content: The camera takes good pictures has lots of features, but like many of the other pocket cameras it is  getting too tiny to hold.  No place to put your fingers without pushing a button.  Proprietary  LI battery is a problem, what do you do if you need a charge in the field, too bad you cannot run into a store and get 2- AA or AAA battery and keep going.. You must have the stinking Proprietary cable to charge the battery and USB adaptor for 100-240 volt AC.. I had a SL30 which was great (2AA bats) until it jumped out of my pocket into the lake.. and I cannot find a good small point and shoot that still uses AA or AAA battery... AA & AAA come in rechargeable also but you can buy them in any country off the rack and keep going.. Not so with this one.. Bottom line it is too small to hold and uses Proprietary  battery and cable interface are a problem.

Reviews.Title: ve109658 johan diaz
Reviews.Author: johan
Reviews.Content: hey super calida los zapatos 100% responsable lo certifico y los califico muy muy bien gracias y doy fe q son seguro y confiables y la entrega llego la fecha dicha

Reviews.Title: false advertising!!!
Reviews.Author: mandar
Reviews.Content: got it for my daughter for chrismas. package good, said it was EC-PL 120 with dual lcd screen on the box. to her dismay when she opened the package to see a similar samsung camera with only 1 lcd screen. had to return it.

Reviews.Title: Bad sale
Reviews.Author: Vincent G. Piluits "Xbondfan"
Reviews.Content: STAY AWAY I've been unable to unload the pictures from this camera to my WIN7 PC it just doesn't see the camera and yet my Blu_ray player does, only you cannot download on said device.Mind you I got this camera only last week mostly for the duel view system, when I contacted SAMSUNG they wanted me to send the camera to them for repair, (a brand new camera?)On the CD it saids something about a program(s)on the CD they are not there and when one goes to the site there isn't anything (drivers etc)for this camera just some ZIP you can download from elsewhere on the site with some file with which you can't do anything.

Reviews.Author: Freddy Garita
Reviews.Content: Be detailed and specific. What would you have wanted to know before you purchased the product?Not too short and not too long. Aim for between 75 and 300 words.

Reviews.Title: If you did not go to MIT or are not a Rocket Scientist Beware!
Reviews.Author: Palmed
Reviews.Content: I was impressed with all the features for the price and liked the dual view feature.  However, when I started going through the user material and started trying to learn all the mode and menu icons, I got a class 5 headache!  I would need to carry around the manual and consult it every time I used this unit!  To say it is not user friendly is kind.  I had to take it back, and when I did, the headache stopped.

ProductInfo.Features:
The Samsung PL120 offers Smart Filter, a collection of lens effects that give your still shots an artistic edge , 720HD Movie
In addition to the 2.7-inch viewfinder on the rear of the camera, there is an additional 1.5-inch LCD screen on front , 14.2 Megapixel.
14.2 Mega Still + 720p HD Movie (MJPEG)
1.5" Dual LCD for perfect portrait shot
Smart Filter 2.0 to make every photo unique
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung EC-PL120 Digital Camera with 14.2 MP and 5x Optical Zoom (Black)
